ext.description: Set video backgrounds (MP4, WebM, OGG) for your VSCode workspace
config.title: VSCode Background
config.enabled:
Enable/disable video background.

After changing, run **Install/Update** command to apply.
config.videos:
Video file paths. Supports:
- Absolute local paths: `C:\\Videos\\bg.mp4` or `/home/user/videos/bg.mp4`
- `file:///` URLs
- `https://` URLs

**Videos stay at their original location** and are NOT affected by VSCode updates.
config.opacity:
Workbench opacity (0 = fully transparent, 1 = fully opaque).

**Tip:** Try 0.7~0.9 for the best experience.
config.switchInterval:
Seconds between switching videos.

Set to `0` to loop the current video forever.

Minimum effective value: 10 seconds.
config.theme.glass: Glass — Fully transparent, video shows clearly
config.theme.matte: Matte — Semi-transparent frosted glass effect with blur
config.theme.neon: Neon — Cyberpunk style with glowing cyan/magenta borders
config.theme.cinema: Cinema — Dark cinematic look with letterbox-style bars
config.theme.aurora: Aurora — Colorful gradient overlay with soft glow
config.theme.minimal: Minimal — Only reduces opacity, no extra effects
